title: I'm here to help out (Mac and Window users are welcome)
body:
Hey guys,

I have recently been roaming around the League boards and came upon the help & support section. Any League related issues such as connection problem/fps problem etc, feel free to post them here or make a new discussion and I will get back to you guys in a jiffy xD. This way, everyone is able to get a quick response rather than submit a ticket to RIOT. 

Have a great day and look forward to roaming around the League help & support boards :D. I will spend most of my time here, keeping an eye out for your guy's post. 

Cheers
Swhyper
